Multiply me by many I become a green patch of living things.
I bow where bells and holy waters fall,
Near the sacred stone that devotees call.

CREATE&nbsp TABLE&nbsp Visionary&nbsp (
&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp id&nbsp INT&nbsp PRIMARY&nbsp KEY,
&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp first_name&nbsp VARCHAR(10),
&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp last_name&nbsp VARCHAR(10),
&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp domain&nbsp VARCHAR(20),
&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp title&nbsp VARCHAR(30),
&nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp dream&nbsp VARCHAR(100)
);

INSERT&nbsp INTO&nbsp Visionary&nbsp VALUES
(1,&nbsp '*****',&nbsp '*****',&nbsp 'Aerospace',&nbsp 'People\'s&nbsp President',&nbsp 'Dream,&nbsp Dream,&nbsp Dream...');


SELECT&nbsp first_name,&nbsp last_name
FROM&nbsp Visionary
WHERE&nbsp domain&nbsp =&nbsp 'Aerospace'
&nbsp &nbsp AND&nbsp title&nbsp LIKE&nbsp '%President%'
&nbsp &nbsp AND&nbsp dream&nbsp LIKE&nbsp '%Dream%';

Majestic and proud, above the ground,
Where cheers and applause often resound.
In whose hall does wisdom arrive,
On the second rise, where ideas thrive?
Yet to shine like the radiant sun,
One must first burn ‚Äî as all greats have done.

Not in Rome, but still colossal.

Some mark respect where few wheels go.
Reserved it stands, calm and true,
A space for those who move anew.

Where silence and peace are melodious song.

section .data
 &nbsp msg db "I guard your money, speak in digits,", 10
        &nbsp &nbsp db "Serve you day and night without a tongue.", 10
        &nbsp &nbsp db "What am I?", 10, 10
        &nbsp &nbsp db "Answer: ATM", 10
    &nbsp  len equ $-msg

section .text
   &nbsp global _start

_start:
    &nbsp mov rax, 1 &nbsp ;sys_write
    &nbsp mov rdi, 1 &nbsp ;stdout
    &nbsp mov rsi, msg
    &nbsp mov rdx, len
    &nbsp syscall
    &nbsp mov rax, 60 &nbsp ;sys_exit
    &nbsp xor rdi, rdi
    &nbsp syscall
